Package thomasmccue.dbclientapp.controller

Class LogInController

java.lang.Object
thomasmccue.dbclientapp.controller.LogInController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class LogInController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The LogInController class managed the log in window and the record of log in attempts

  • Method Details

    • clickLogIn

      public void clickLogIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      When the login button is clicked, the username and password inputs are checked to see if they are valid. If they are, the landing page window is launched. If now, an error message is displayed. Each log in attempt calls the recordLogins() method.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • recordLogins

      public static void recordLogins(String username, boolean loggedIn)
      recordLogins() writes to the login_activity.txt file and is called every time the login button is clicked. It records the username that was attempted, the time of the attempt in UTC and the system default local time, and whether or not the log in was successful.
      Parameters:
      username - username from user input
      loggedIn - boolean true/false depending on if the login attempt was successful

    • clickClose

      public void clickClose(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      This method closes the window when the close button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      event -
      Throws:
      IOException

    • setResourceBundle

      public void setResourceBundle(ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method sets the resource bundle so that the log in window displays the form in English or French based on the user’s computer language setting. Allows all the text, labels, buttons, and errors on the form to be translated appropriately
      Parameters:
      resourceBundle - prepared files for what to display depending on the computers language setting

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      The initialize method is called first when the window opens, and sets/uses the resource bundle to display the form in English or French based on the user’s computer language setting.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url -
      resourceBundle -
